item.title: Project Euler 18: Maximum Path Sum I
item.description: Problem Statement By starting at the top of the triangle below and moving to adjacent numbers on the row below, the maximal total from top to bottom is 23. Figure 1: Note that 3+7+4+9 = 23. Find the maximum path length for a given such triangle. My Algorithm We use a data structure that mimics the structure of a given triangle. For each row, we update a parent array to store the maximal path sums that end in each entry of the row above.
